channel.title: Timelines on Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Timelines on Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Owner, Director
item.description: Computer Right Ltd I was employed as a manager, computer expert, sales representative and engineer at Computer Right, a computer shop in Bristol registered under Bristol Office Essentials Ltd. My duty included all managerial roles in running a successful shop, alongside repairing and building Windows and Mac PCs/laptops and mobiles. I engage with clients on the telephone and in store to resolve computer related problems. Since starting in April 2016, I have cleaned, organised and streamlined the workshop established modern, agile working practices which have significantly helped with work flow and profitability.
item.content:
Computer Right Ltd

I was employed as a manager, computer expert, sales representative and engineer at Computer Right, a computer shop in Bristol registered under Bristol Office Essentials Ltd. My duty included all managerial roles in running a successful shop, alongside repairing and building Windows and Mac PCs/laptops and mobiles. I engage with clients on the telephone and in store to resolve computer related problems. Since starting in April 2016, I have cleaned, organised and streamlined the workshop established modern, agile working practices which have significantly helped with work flow and profitability. I looked after spend, stock, financial recording and managine suppliers and customers. I also completely overhauled the Computer Right website, and social media accounts. During the 7 months I was employed, turnover increased over 50% from the months previous to my employment and Computer Right received a 200% increase on 4 and 5 star Google reviews, compared to the previous 4 years.

I soon wrote a business plan to expand on Computer Right and bought the business as an asset from the previous company.

item.title: Co-founder, CTO
item.description: Jenca Ltd Jenca was a Not For Profit company offering a PaaS/IaaS product on which Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) web application developers can easily market and run their applications at a global scale. We are a community project that is 100% open source. Jenca has been featured in BIM+ magazine and is partnered with other cutting edge AEC web applications like the BIMserver, 3D Repo and Duraark.
item.content:
Jenca Ltd

Jenca was a Not For Profit company offering a PaaS/IaaS product on which Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) web application developers can easily market and run their applications at a global scale. We are a community project that is 100% open source. Jenca has been featured in BIM+ magazine and is partnered with other cutting edge AEC web applications like the BIMserver, 3D Repo and Duraark.

item.title: Speaker
item.description: KubeCon Europe Conference 2016 KubeCon is the major Google Kubernetes conference in the world. I was invited to speak by the organisers based on the work they had seen on GitHub. I presented the story about how Jenca applied the Google Kubernetes technology to a new vertical industry: AEC
item.content:
KubeCon Europe Conference 2016

KubeCon is the major Google Kubernetes conference in the world. I was invited to speak by the organisers based on the work they had seen on GitHub. I presented the story about how Jenca applied the Google Kubernetes technology to a new vertical industry: AEC

item.title: Speaker
item.description: AEChack Conference 2015 AEChack is a worldwide recognised hackathon for the AEC industries. I gave a presentation titled Biomimetic Driven Development, describing the lean, agile strategy we employed as a company.
item.content:
AEChack Conference 2015

AEChack is a worldwide recognised hackathon for the AEC industries. I gave a presentation titled Biomimetic Driven Development, describing the lean, agile strategy we employed as a company.

item.title: Co-founder, CTO
item.description: BIMscript Ltd BIMscript was a technology and BIM consultancy for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction industries. We provided expert advice and implementation on cutting edge technologies including virtual reality, 3d printing, 3d scanning and modelling, BIM implementation and strategy and web technologies. Our clients included major construction and engineering firms VolkerFitzpatrick and Hoare Lea, and other clients such as FreestyleXtreme Ltd and the Foundation for the Common Good. During the time as CTO for BIMscript, we completed a proof of concept for a large scale web platform to revolutionise the method of project delivery of our major client, VolkerFitzpatrick.
item.content:
BIMscript Ltd

BIMscript was a technology and BIM consultancy for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction industries. We provided expert advice and implementation on cutting edge technologies including virtual reality, 3d printing, 3d scanning and modelling, BIM implementation and strategy and web technologies. Our clients included major construction and engineering firms VolkerFitzpatrick and Hoare Lea, and other clients such as FreestyleXtreme Ltd and the Foundation for the Common Good.

During the time as CTO for BIMscript, we completed a proof of concept for a large scale web platform to revolutionise the method of project delivery of our major client, VolkerFitzpatrick. This project not only won funding, but was highly received by the client and many other significant actors in the construction tech world. The project, named the BIMportal, is a multi-device web based suite of applications which enabled all stakeholders in a project to engage with it in real time.

BIMportal on Mac. BIMportal on Android.

item.title: Speaker
item.description: TE&CH Conference 2015 TE&CH is a technology and education conference aimed at fringe research projects gaining traction in the UK. I presented BIMscript / Jenca’s development method and demo.
item.content:
TE&CH Conference 2015

TE&CH is a technology and education conference aimed at fringe research projects gaining traction in the UK. I presented BIMscript / Jenca’s development method and demo.

item.title: Speaker
item.description: World Information Architecture UX Conference 2015 I was invited to speak at the World Information Architecture UX Conference in Bristol. I presented how to design web applications for people in the construction industry, specifically how to design an application which can be used by labourers on site and in the office.
item.content:
World Information Architecture UX Conference 2015

I was invited to speak at the World Information Architecture UX Conference in Bristol. I presented how to design web applications for people in the construction industry, specifically how to design an application which can be used by labourers on site and in the office.

item.title: Co-founder, Vice President
item.description: Future Technology and Design FT+D was a society founded whilst studying Architecture and Planning as a method to encourage multi-discipline discussion around architecture. We completed one major project to build a 3D scanner from scratch. This included designing and making circuit boards, 3D printing components and learning the software to manipulate point clouds/meshes taken from the scans.
item.content:
Future Technology and Design

FT+D was a society founded whilst studying Architecture and Planning as a method to encourage multi-discipline discussion around architecture. We completed one major project to build a 3D scanner from scratch. This included designing and making circuit boards, 3D printing components and learning the software to manipulate point clouds/meshes taken from the scans.

item.title: Computer Technician
item.description: Eye-Systems Ltd I was employed as a computer technician and advisor. My roles included designing and building PC systems, repairing customer PCs, helping customers on the telephone and in store, designing and installing networks in business premises and installing, repairing and maintaining Operating Systems and software.
item.content:
Eye-Systems Ltd

I was employed as a computer technician and advisor. My roles included designing and building PC systems, repairing customer PCs, helping customers on the telephone and in store, designing and installing networks in business premises and installing, repairing and maintaining Operating Systems and software.
